Method Detail

reset

public void reset()
Description copied from interface: WindowScrollPositionContext
Resets all the remembered scroll coordinates to nothing. (WindowScrollPositionContext.pop() will not have any further effect).

Specified by:
reset in interface WindowScrollPositionContext

updateScroll

protected void updateScroll(String x,
                            String y)
Method used internally to update scroll position. The class-level variables windowScrollX and windowScrollY should be updated only through this method so that the changes would also reach the form.

Parameters:
x - A string value of horizontal scroll position, or null for no specific position.
y - A string value of vertical scroll position, or null for no specific position.
Since:
2.0

defaultValue

protected static String defaultValue(String value)
Resolves the default value for empty coordinate value.

Parameters:
value - The value to check
Returns:
The value or its replacement.
Since:
2.0
